name: Low-Vol Large-Cap Bollinger/RSI Mean-Reversion
description: Daily mean-reversion equity strategy that trades highly liquid, low-volatility U.S. large-cap stocks. Entries use Bollinger Band extremes confirmed by RSI oversold/overbought, aiming for reversion to the 20-day mean. Fixed-fractional sizing risks 2 % of equity per trade, with volatility-adjusted ATR stops and targets.
